concept.title: Network interface setup on Windows 8 and 10

conbody.p: Right click on the Start button or press Win + X on your keyboard and select Device manager from the menu.
In the Device manager window ( ) select Network adapters and double click on the name of the network interface (e.g., Realtek PCIe GBE Family Controller).
Select Advanced tab in the Properties window ( ) and set the properties according to the table below.

row.entry: Realtek PCIe GBE Family Controller properties

conbody.p: This property enables student workstation to be woken up remotely from the teacher module.
conbody.note: During the first run of teacher or student module you may have to allow their network access in either built in Windows firewall or a third party one. Usially the firewall will prompt you about Dialog Nibelung network access, which you should confirm.
